subject: Football
Murders and Attempted Murders
Suicides and Suicide Attempts
lead_paragraph: An autopsy showed that Kansas City Chiefs linebacker Jovan Belcher was drunk when he shot his girlfriend, Kasandra Perkins, and then killed himself last month in Missouri.
snippet: An autopsy showed that Kansas City Chiefs linebacker Jovan Belcher was drunk when he shot his girlfriend, Kasandra Perkins, and then killed himself last month in Missouri.
